amendment.description: An amendment numbered 20 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to direct the Secretary to use the DOD Base Closure Account to make funding available for the purposes of demolishing facilities closed by prior BRAC rounds.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Torres amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A051) offered by Mrs. Torres.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Torres amendment (A051) Agreed to by voice vote.
